title: You cannot escape me!
desc:
Post 4472
Abilities
- Select a player and learn three roles they could be (one role will be town, two will not be), then select the role you think they are the following day. If you are correct and your selection was not town, you will chase them down relentlessly the following night, increasing your attack to Powerful and your Defense to invincible for the night and dealing an attack to them.
- Alternatively just attack someone I guess.
Attributes
- Your attack cannot be escaped, you cannot be roleblocked, redirected, stopped by a jailor, anything that would prevent the attack. The only thing that can stop you from dealing an attack to the target is something that can heal your target from anything I guess. Not sure that even exists but w/e.
